attributes.action: stop the abuse and neglect of the elderly in residential care homes  and ensure all are adequately staffed with qualified staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ELDERLY PEOPLE ARE BEING ABUSED AS PUBLICISED IN THE MEDIA AND ARE NEGLECTED AND DEGRADED BY INEPT UNTRAINED STAFF - ENSURE ALL HOMES ARE ADEQUATELY STAFFED AND FUNDED FOR STAFFING - ALSO BRING IN AN ACT TO ENSURE THESE WORKERS AND ALL RESIDENTIAL CARE WORKERS ARE QUALIFIED WITH A RECOGNISED QUALIFICATION IN THE UK AND WITH CHECKED AND CHECKABLE REFERENCES NOW PLEASE - DO NOT DELAY ANY LONGER PLEASE!

rejection.details: Please use a full name and please do not write entirely in capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
